data.name: AddSchemaExtensionRewriter_DirectiveDoesNotExist
data.value: The directive `{0}` was not specified in this schema and cannot be used.

data.name: AddSchemaExtensionRewriter_DirectiveIsUnique
data.value: The directive `{0}` is not marked as repeatable and can only be declared once.

data.name: AddSchemaExtensionRewriter_TypeMismatch
data.value: `{0}` is of type `{1}` and cannot be extended with `{2}`.

data.value: Specifies the fields on which a computed field is dependent on.
